  explanation_1: "∃x y. PatientHepatoblastoma x ∧ With x y ∧ CTNNB1 y ∧ W25_H36del y"

 assumes asm: "PatientHepatoblastoma x ∧ With x y ∧ W25_H36del y"

 shows "∃x y. PatientHepatoblastoma x ∧ ActivatingMutation y ∧ In x y ∧ CTNNB1 y"

  from asm have "PatientHepatoblastoma x ∧ With x y ∧ W25_H36del y" <ATP>

  (* We can infer that the patient has an activating mutation in CTNNB1. *)
  then have "∃x y. PatientHepatoblastoma x ∧ ActivatingMutation y ∧ With x y ∧ CTNNB1 y" <ATP>
  then show ?thesis <ATP>
qed

end
